body_html:
I'd rather not have a graph per se in eager. Right now one exists and there are subtle ways in which the code depends on it (scoping of graph collections, for example) but those will be phased out.
…

body:
I'd rather not have a graph per se in eager. Right now one exists and there
are subtle ways in which the code depends on it (scoping of graph
collections, for example) but those will be phased out.

On Tue, Jul 17, 2018 at 12:54 PM Konpat <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> Thanks for the clarification. I
> understand that there will be a graph thing of eager too?
>
> —
